div.head: 手足動搖
div.div: shaking movements of hands and feet

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: shaking movements of hands and feet

sense.def: Illness Sign of uncontrolled shaking of hands and feet. Huo you xin shu 活幼心書 Lj: 氣促喘悶，手足動 搖，似搐非搐 , “The qi is hurried, with panting and heart-pressure. Hands and feet display a shaking movement as if they had been pulled, when in fact they were not”.
